com.receiver2d.engine

Class GameUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.receiver2d.engine.GameUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The main thread responsible for updating all of the logic in-game. Such logic includes physics, collision detection, and tick()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int tickHertz
      The number of allowable ticks per second, in hertz.

    • Method Detail

      • getLastTickTime

        public long getLastTickTime()
        Gets the last time since an instance of tick() was performed.
        Returns:
        A time in nanoseconds.

      • setInterpolation

        public void setInterpolation(float interp)
        Manually set the current interpolation coefficient of the graphics update. This ensures that the graphics update looks as "smooth" as possible with the fixed-time tick() instance. By default, an interpolation value is calculated by the engine automatically.
        Parameters:
        interp - An interpolation value.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates game logic instantaneously. Will automatically do nothing if the time since the last tick is less than an arbitrary minimum. The tick() function operates on a fixed-time loop.

      • logicUpdate

        public void logicUpdate(float interp)
        Performs a logic-based update of the game engine. For example, a ball
        Parameters:
        interp -

      • logicUpdate

        public void logicUpdate()
